caption.p: SRB assay on HeLa cells to evaluate the effect of the four plant extracts: ( A) Xylopia aethiopica (XA), ( B) Imperata cylindrica (IC), ( C) Echinops giganteus (EG) and ( D) Dorstenia psilurus (DP) on the cell growth after 48 h (X-axis: log concentrations of extracts from 1 to 200 (µg/mL) and Y-axis: the percentage of normalized absorbance). While ( E): The comparison of average IC 50 of the four plant extracts over 48 h (Y-axis: concentration in (µg/mL). Values are mean ± SD of three independent experiments.
